## ObjectFromEntries type

Type utility that represents an object type created from an array of key-value pairs. Used by the [fromEntries()](./type-object.fromentries.md) function to provide type-safe object creation from entries.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ObjectFromEntries<T> = T extends [unknown, unknown][] ? {
    [K in Extract<T[number][0], PropertyKey>]: Extract<T[number], [
        K,
        unknown
    ]>[1];
} : never;
```

## Example


```ts
type Entries = [['a', 1], ['b', 2]] as const;
type Result = ObjectFromEntries<Entries>; // { a: 1, b: 2 }
```
